properties.name: documentation.application.description
properties.description: Description for application to be used in OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: authorization.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens.

properties.description: Version of the application to be used in OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: authorization.jwt.expiration.days
properties.description: Number of days after which the JWT token expires.
